what: Get GDP scenarios and building blocks — calcGDP
title: Get GDP scenarios and building blocks — calcGDP
text: Get complete GDP scenarios calcGDP, past/future scenario building blocks calcGDPPast calcGDPFuture. Complete scenarios created harmonizing future projections (returned calcGDPFuture) onto historical data (returned calcGDPPast) cover years 1960 2100. GDP data scenario required, even just single year, always use calcGDP, returned calcGDPPast calcGDPFuture may end scenario, depending harmonization function used (see GDPcalib argument information). Use calcGDPPast calcGDPFuture trying access specific GDP data, constructing new complete scenarios. default, calcGDP returns following scenarios: SSPs, .e. SSP1-5 SDPs, .e. SDP, SDP_EI, SDP_RC, SDP_MC SSP2EU

title: Get GDP scenarios and building blocks — calcGDP
code: calcGDP(   scenario = c("SSPs", "SDPs", "SSP2EU"),   GDPCalib = NULL,   GDPPast = NULL,   GDPFuture = NULL,   unit = "constant 2005 Int$PPP",   extension2150 = "bezier",   FiveYearSteps = TRUE,   average2020 = TRUE,   naming = "indicator_scenario" )  calcGDPFuture(   GDPFuture = "SSPs-MI",   unit = "constant 2005 Int$PPP",   extension2150 = "none" )  calcGDPPast(GDPPast = "WDI-MI", unit = "constant 2005 Int$PPP")

title: Get GDP scenarios and building blocks — calcGDP
text: scenario character vector designating scenario(s) returned. See toolGetScenarioDefinition() learn scenarios available. argument recommended - quickest - way choose scenario. fine-tuning necessary, use xCalib, xPast xFuture arguments directly. GDPCalib NULL (default), string designating harmonization function. Available harmonization functions : "calibSSPs": use past data, short term growth rates IMF afterwards transition GDPPast GDPFuture transition period 2100 "calibSSP2EU": use past data, short term growth rates IMF afterwards transition GDPPast GDPFuture transition period 2100. European countries, just glue past future 2070 converge 2150 SSP2 values. "calibSDPs": calibSSPs "past": deprecated "future": deprecated "transition": deprecated "past_transition": use past data afterwards transition GDPPast GDPFuture transition period 2050 GDPPast NULL (default), string designating source historical GDP data. Available sources : "WDI": World development indicators World Bank "MI": Missing island dataset "Eurostat": Eurostat "PWT": Penn World Tables IHME/James data set. data set tertiary source uses available secondary sources (e.g. WDI PWT) create completed GDP per capita time series (See paper). access, pass one subtypes "IHME_USD05_PPP_pc", "IHME_USD05_MER_pc", "IMF_USD05_PPP_pc", "PENN_USD05_PPP_pc", "WB_USD05_PPP_pc", "MADDISON_USD05_PPP_pc", "WB_USD05_MER_pc", "IMF_USD05_MER_pc", "UN_USD05_MER_pc". cases, per capita GDP multiplied WDI population data get absoulte GDP data. See "Combining data sources '-'" section combine data sources. GDPFuture NULL (default), string designating source future GDP data. Available sources : "SSPs": IIASA SSP database "SSP2EU": Combined SSP2 Eurostat (EU countries) source "SDPs": "MI": Missing island dataset "OECD": OECD "SRES": deprecated See "Combining data sources '-'" section combine data sources. unit string specifying unit GDP. Can either: "constant 2005 Int$PPP" (default): Default unit scenarios constructed. "constant 2005 US$MER": Scenarios constructed constant 2005 Int$PPP converted returned GDPuc::convertGDP. "constant 2017 Int$PPP": Scenarios constructed constant 2017 Int$PPP (See paper). "constant 2017 US$MER": Scenarios constructed constant 2017 Int$PPP converted returned GDPuc::convertGDP. cases, GDP returned millions. extension2150 string specifying /scenarios extended 2150. Can either: "bezier" (default): bezier curve extension leads smooth flattening scenario: slope last year scenario halved 2150. Currently works scenarios 2100 last year. "constant": last value scenarios taken constant 2150. "none": extension. FiveYearSteps FiveYearSteps = TRUE deprecated soon. , please set FiveYearSteps = FALSE use calcOutput argument years instead, retrieve specific years. average2020 TRUE (default) FALSE. TRUE, 2020 value replaced 2018-2022 average. naming string giving naming scheme data dimension. Can either: "indicator_scenario" (default): Returns names type "gdp_SSP2", "pop_SSP2". "indicator.scenario": Returns names type "gdp.SSP2", "pop.SSP2". "scenario": Returns names type "SSP2". Set naming "scenario" want operate SSP2 gdp population data instance, worry conflicting names.

title: Harmonization tool PastGrFuture — toolHarmonizePastGrFuture
text: Like harmonization tools mrdrivers, toolHarmonizePastGrFuture takes two magpie objects, 'past' 'future', returns single magpie object, .e. harmonized time-series. case, harmonized time-series equal 'past', years 'past', follows growth rates 'future', years 'future'.

title: Harmonization tool PastGrFuture — toolHarmonizePastGrFuture
text: past magpie object one scenario/datatype, .e. length third dimension 1. future magpie object.

title: Harmonization tool PastGrFuture — toolHarmonizePastGrFuture
text: magpie object dimensions 'future'.

title: Harmonization tool PastGrFuture — toolHarmonizePastGrFuture
text: 'future' object multiple scenarios/datatypes, .e. length third dimension larger 1, harmonized time-series created every scenario/datatype future. 'past' object used every case - hence requirement 'past' one scenario/datatype.

title: Harmonization tool PastTransition — toolHarmonizePastTransition
text: Like harmonization tools mrdrivers, toolHarmonizePastTransition takes two magpie objects, 'past' 'future', returns single magpie object, .e. harmonized time-series. case, harmonized time-series equal 'past', years 'past', transitions 'future' year 'yEnd'. yEnd, harmonized time-series equal 'future'. transition phase, share absolute difference 'past' future' last year past' added future. share starts 1 last year 'past' decreases linearly 0 yEnd.

title: Harmonization tool PastTransition — toolHarmonizePastTransition
text: past magpie object one scenario/datatype, .e. length third dimension 1. future magpie object. yEnd integer designating last year transition period.

title: Harmonization tool PastTransition — toolHarmonizePastTransition
text: magpie object dimensions 'future'.

title: Harmonization tool PastTransition — toolHarmonizePastTransition
text: 'future' object multiple scenarios/datatypes, .e. length third dimension larger 1, harmonized time-series created every scenario/datatype future. 'past' object used every case - hence requirement 'past' one scenario/datatype.
